sen.j: 前田 半田（まえだ はんでん、1817年（文化 (日本)14年） - 1878年（明治11年））は日本の画家。
sen.e: Handen MAEDA (1817-1878) was a Japanese painter.
Handen MAEDA (1817-1878) was a Japanese painter.
Handen MAEDA (1817-1878) was a Japanese painter.

sen.j: 徳島県美馬郡つるぎ町（旧半田町）出身。
sen.e: Born in Tsurugi-cho (former Handa-cho), Mima County, Tokushima Prefecture.
Born in Tsurugi-cho (former Handa-cho), Mima County, Tokushima Prefecture.
Born in Tsurugi-cho (former Handa-cho), Mima County, Tokushima Prefecture.
His real name was Chodo MAEDA.
His real name was Chodo MAEDA.
His real name was Chodo MAEDA.
His name was Seki.
His name was Seki.
His name was Seki.
His azana (adult male's nickname) were Shika or Jippo.
His azana (adult male's nickname) were Shika and Jippo.
His azana (adult male's nickname) were Shika and Jippo.
His different pseudonym was Chodo or Seigyu.
His different pseudonyms were Chodo and Seigyu.
sen.cmt: 複数化、andに変更しました。
sen.e: His different pseudonyms were Chodo and Seigyu.

sen.j: 文化14年（1817年）に医師である前田養拙の子として京都府で生まれた。
sen.e: Born in Kyoto in 1817, as the son of a doctor Yosetsu MAEDA.
Born in Kyoto in 1817, as a son of a doctor, Yosetsu MAEDA.
sen.cmt: 冠詞変更、コンマ挿入しました。
sen.e: Born in Kyoto in 1817, as a son of a doctor, Yosetsu MAEDA.

sen.j: 中島来章から日本画を学ぶ。
sen.e: Learned Japanese-style painting from Raisho NAKAJIMA.
Learned Japanese-style painting from Raisho NAKAJIMA.
Learned Japanese-style painting from Raisho NAKAJIMA.

sen.j: その後、貫名菘翁、山本梅逸を師として、京都を中心に活躍していく。
sen.e: Later, having Suo NUKINA and Baiitsu YAMAMOTO as his masters, he was active in Kyoto area.
Later, having Suo NUKINA and Baiitsu YAMAMOTO as his masters, he was active in Kyoto area.
Later, having Suo NUKINA and Baiitsu YAMAMOTO as his masters, he was active in Kyoto area.

sen.j: 明治5年（1872年）に前田暢堂から前田半田と改名したとされる。
sen.e: It is thought that he changed his name from Chodo MAEDA to Handen MAEDA in 1872.
It is thought that he changed his name from Chodo MAEDA to Handen MAEDA in 1872.
It is thought that he changed his name from Chodo MAEDA to Handen MAEDA in 1872.
Died in 1878, at the age of 62.
Died in 1878, at the age of 62.
Died in 1878, at the age of 62.
